topSpots.name: Ho Chi Minh City
topSpots.description: Explore Vietnam's largest city, where modern skyscrapers meet historic landmarks and a thriving food scene.

topSpots.name: Phu Quoc
topSpots.description: Relax on pristine beaches, enjoy the crystal-clear waters, and explore the rich marine life of this beautiful tropical island.

topSpots.name: Mui Ne
topSpots.description: Famous for its red and white sand dunes, Mui Ne offers a picturesque coastal experience with adventure sports.

favorites.name: Con Dao
favorites.description: Visit Con Dao, a group of islands with a rich history, beautiful beaches, and some of the best diving spots in Vietnam.

favorites.name: Mekong Delta
favorites.description: Experience floating markets of the Mekong Delta, a region known for its intricate network of rivers and canals.

favorites.name: Can Tho
favorites.description: Discover Can Tho, the largest city in the Mekong Delta, known for its bustling floating markets and picturesque riverside promenades.
